document_title: PRADHAN MANTRI KISAN SAMMAN NIDHI SCHEME
objective: To provide income support to all landholding farmers’ families in the country, having cultivable land.
benefits: Supplement the financial needs of all landholding farmers’ families in procuring various inputs to ensure proper crop health and appropriate yields.
Transfer of Rs.6000/- per year in three installments of Rs.2000/- each every 4-month / trimester.
eligibility: Landholding farmers’ families in the country, having cultivable land.
documents_required: Aadhaar enrollment number with any other ID proof like Voter ID etc
how_to_apply: Beneficiaries under the scheme are to be identified by the respective State and Union Territory.
Details of farmers are being maintained by the States / UTs either in electronic form or in manual register.

To make integrated platform available in the country to assist in benefit transfer, a platform named PM-Kisan Portal available at URL (http://pmkisan.gov.in) has been launched for uploading the farmers’ details at a single web-portal in a uniform structure.
